    * @link : https://foundation.zurb.com/
    * @dependencies:
    1: jQuery JavaScript Library v3.2.1
         * @version v3.2.1
         * @link https://jquery.com/download/
    2: what-input - A global utility for tracking the current input method (mouse, keyboard or touch).
         * @version v4.2.0
         * @link https://github.com/ten1seven/what-input
